knimeNode.name: Decision Tree Predictor (deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is obsolete! Please use the new Decision Tree Predictor node located in the Mining category.

fullDescription.intro:
This node is obsolete! Please use the new Decision Tree Predictor node located in the Mining category.
This node uses an existing decision tree (passed in through the model port) to predict the class value for new patterns. The Node can be configured as follows:
fullDescription.option: Determines the maximum number of patterns the tree will store to support HiLiting.

ports.dataOut: The input table with one column added containing the classification
ports.modelIn: A previously learned decision tree model

views.view: The decision tree as given in the model port along with the classified data.
